title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might surprise friends and colleagues by how quickly you seize a current opportunity. You are after a specific goal and have a concrete plan in mind. But its difficult to negotiate sharing power and prospects with others when youre already locked into a storm-the-gates mentality. However, a knock on the door suffices, allowing you to open it without resistance. But your attitudinal shift requires the wisdom to trust that speed and force arent the most useful weapons in your arsenal. Author Honore de Balzac wrote, All human power is a compound of time and patience. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
